column4: is there a way /in ubuntu/ (so this is not off topic) to make it so the people watching my network wont be able to tell that i'm torrenting?
best not to bittorrent in universities
ah, but the other p2p stuff for ubuntu isn't very good...soulseek for windows orked very well, but for some reason nicotine sucks
Did you install with apt-get?
probably, yeah
dpkg -list | grep nicotine
Sorry, its actually dpkg -l | grep nicotine
ii  nicotine                               1.0.8rc1-1.1 graphical client for the SoulSeek peer-to-pe
Yep you installed it with apt-get
apt-get remove nicotine
D'arg. sudo apt-get remove nicotine
hhe thanks a lot
No problem :)
If you have openssh-server installed, you can get a terminal.
If you start a TightVNC server you can use VNC as well

i just want to connect to the internet with ubuntu
that's what i meant
Are you useing ethernet or wireless?
ethernet
You should just plug the cable into your computer and be right on. Did you see the rx/tx lights on the back turn on?
